sourcesContent: import { useStyles } from "./styles"; import { Grid, Typography, Paper } from '@material-ui/core'; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; function Stats({ planet }) { const classes = useStyles(); return ( <> rotation time {planet.rotation} { (planet.name === "Mercury" || planet.name === "Venus" || planet.name === "Earth" || planet.name === "Mars") ? ' Days' : ' Hours'} revolution time {planet.revolution} radius {planet.radius} average temp {planet.temperature} ) } export default Stats
